definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Lars used to say that ninety percent of Saunière’s story is fiction.
sentences.chinese: 佬司常说尚尼亚故事的百分子九十是杜撰的。

sentences.english: I keep forgetting, it's the Russkies now.
Chinks are overestimating themselves after STEALING military hardware design details from US.
sentences.chinese: 从美国窃取军事机密后，中国佬开始高估自己。

sentences.english: But nobody calls my partner a kike. Do you understand?
sentences.chinese: 但没有人能叫我的搭档犹太佬明白吗？

sentences.english: Tell the Kraut to get his ass up front.
sentences.chinese: 告诉那个德国佬，把他的屁股靠前一点。

sentences.english: I don't have anything against the Japs and the Chinks.
sentences.chinese: 我并不反对日本鬼子和中国佬。

sentences.english: Hey, look, Frenchy , I thought about it.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，看着，法国佬我一直在想。

sentences.english: You gooks are so dirty and your country smells like .
sentences.chinese: 更让我受不了的是你们这些韩国佬外语的发音。

sentences.english: All Londoners who are born within the sound of Bow Bells are called cockneys.
sentences.chinese: 所有土生土长的伦敦人被称为是伦敦佬。

sentences.english: It makes me sick too the way you gooks pronounce foreignlanguages.
sentences.chinese: 更让我受不了的是你们这些韩国佬外语的发音。

sentences.english: New Yorkers can shop locally and buy globally.
sentences.chinese: 纽约佬可以在当地买到世界各地的名品。

sentences.english: Did Lars say if he found anything?
sentences.chinese: 佬司有没有说，他发现了什么？

sentences.english: How did us Americans get involved in this conflict between the Brits and the Chinamen?
sentences.chinese: 咱美国人去参和这英国佬和中国佬之间的抵触干什么？

definition: black devil (derogatory term for black or African person)
(Wu dialect) bum/wretched-looking tramp who lives by begging or stealing
penis/(slang) cool or extraordinary/(Cantonese) to fuck
